css: .search_box-1{      position: relative;      height: 50px;    }      .search_box-1 input{      position: absolute;      top: 0;      left: 0;      width: 100%;      height: 100%;      padding: 10px 20px;      padding-right: 100px;      border-radius: 3px;      font-size: 18px;      border: 1px solid #ddd;          } .search_box-1  input:focus{      outline: 0;    }      .search_box-1 .button {     position: absolute;     top: 0;     right: 0;     width: 90px;     height: 100%;     background: crimson;     z-index: 1;     cursor: pointer;     border: none;     color: #fff;     font-weight: bold;     transition: all .2s ease-out;   }  .search_box-1 .button:hover {    background: maroon;  }

.search_box-2 {   position: relative;   height: 50px; }  .search_box-2 input {   position: absolute;   top: 0;   left: 0;   width: 100%;   height: 100%;   padding: 10px 20px;   padding-right: 100px;   border-radius: 25px;   font-size: 18px;   border: 1px solid #ddd; }  .search_box-2 input:focus {   outline: 0; }  .search_box-2 .button {   position: absolute;   top: 0;   right: 0;   width: 90px;   height: 100%;   background: crimson;   z-index: 1;   cursor: pointer;   border: none;   color: #fff;   font-weight: bold;   transition: all .2s ease-out;   border-top-right-radius: 25px;   border-bottom-right-radius: 25px; }  .search_box-2 .button:hover {   background: maroon; }

.search_box-3 {   position: relative;   height: 50px; }  .search_box-3 input {   position: absolute;   top: 0;   left: 0;   width: 100%;   height: 100%;   padding: 10px 20px;   padding-right: 100px;   border-radius: 25px;   font-size: 18px;   border: 1px solid #ddd; }  .search_box-3 input:focus {   outline: 0; }  .search_box-3 .button {   position: absolute;   top: 0;   right: 0;   width: 50px;   height: 100%;   background: crimson;   z-index: 1;   cursor: pointer;   border: none;   color: #fff;   font-weight: bold;   transition: all .2s ease-out;   border-radius: 50%; }  .search_box-3 .button:hover {   background: maroon; }

.search_box-4 {   position: relative;   height: 50px; }  .search_box-4 input {   position: absolute;   top: 0;   left: 0;   width: 100%;   height: 100%;   padding: 10px 20px;   padding-right: 100px;   border-radius: 3px;   font-size: 18px;   border: 1px solid #ddd; }  .search_box-4 input:focus {   outline: 0; }  .search_box-4 .button {   position: absolute;   top: 0;   right: 0;   width: 50px;   height: 100%;   background: transparent;   z-index: 1;   cursor: pointer;   border: none;   color: #fff;   font-weight: bold;   transition: all .2s ease-out;   border-radius: 3px; } .search_box-4 .button svg{   width: 20px;   height: 20px; } .search_box-4 .button svg path {   fill: #555; } .search_box-4 .button:hover {   background: transparent; }

scss: .inputbox1{   position: relative;   padding: size(5) size(0);   &-input{     @include border(solid,1,#ddd);     padding: size(12) size(16);     font-size: size(16);     transition: border 150ms cubic-bezier(0.4,0,0.2,1);     color: #111;     background: none;     @include radius(6);      display: inline-block;     width: 100%;              &:focus,     &:valid{       outline: none;       @include border(solid ,1.5, green);       ~{         .inputbox1-label{           @include transform(translateY(-50%));           @include transform(scale(0.8));         }       }      }    }   &-label{     position: absolute;     left: size(15);     color: #111;     pointer-events: none;     transform: translateY(size(12));     transition: 150ms cubic-bezier(0.4,0,0.2,1);   } }

.input-1{   background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);   @include border (solid,1,rgb(137, 151, 155));   color: rgb(33, 49, 60);   @include font($primaryFont, 14, normal, normal, 14);   @include w100;   @include radius(5);   padding: size(12) size(12);   @include transitionsall;   outline: none;  @include hover{   // box-shadow: rgb(251 218 136) 0px 0px 0px 1px;   @include border(solid ,1,#555)  } }

.searchgroup{   @include flex-center-vert;   @include w100;   position: relative;   padding: size(10) size(0);       &-input {     @include w100;     @include font($primaryFont, 14, normal, normal, 14);     padding: size(14) size(16);     padding-left: size(50);     @include radius(6);     color: #111;     border: 1px solid #ddd;     @include transitionsall;     &:focus,      &:hover{       outline: none;       border-color: #444;     }     &::placeholder{       color: #444;     }    }   &-icon{     position: absolute;     left: size(24);     @include square(20);   } }

.searchbar{   @include flex-center-vert;   @include w100;   position: relative;   padding: size(10) size(0);       &-input {     @include w100;     @include font($primaryFont, 14, normal, normal, 14);     padding: size(13) size(16);     padding-left: size(50);     @include radius(6);     border-top-right-radius: 0;     border-bottom-right-radius: 0;     color: #111;     border: 1px solid #ddd;     border-right: none;     @include transitionsall;     &:focus,      &:hover{       outline: none;       border-color: #444;     }     &::placeholder{       color: #444;     }    }   &-icon{     position: absolute;     left: size(24);     @include square(16);   }   &-btn{    padding: size(11);    @include border(1,solid,slateblue);    @include setBgColor(slateblue,$white);         border-left: none;             } }

html:
• Business Cards
  • Brochures

  • Tshirts
scss: .footerlist_1{  padding: 10px;     .footerlist{         @include list-vertical;              gap: size(6);         &-item{           }         &-link{             color: #333;             position: relative;             @include transitiontransform;             font-family: serif;             &::before{                 content: '';                 position: absolute;                 left: 0;                 bottom: size(-2);                 @include w100;                 height: size(2);                 background-color: black;                 transform: scaleX(0);                @include transitiontransform;             }             @include hover{                 color: black;                 &::before{                     transform: scaleX(1);                 }             }             ;                      }     } }
css: .footerlist_1 {   padding: 10px; } .footerlist_1 .footerlist {   margin: 0;   padding: 0;   list-style: none;   display: flex;   flex-direction: column;   gap: 0.375rem; } .footerlist_1 .footerlist-link {   color: #333;   position: relative;   -webkit-transition: transform 250ms ease-in-out;   -moz-transition: transform 250ms ease-in-out;   -ms-transition: transform 250ms ease-in-out;   -o-transition: transform 250ms ease-in-out;   transition: transform 250ms ease-in-out;   font-family: serif; } .footerlist_1 .footerlist-link::before {   content: '' ;   position: absolute;   left: 0;   bottom: -0.125rem;   width: 100%;   height: 0.125rem;   background-color: black;   transform: scaleX(0);   -webkit-transition: transform 250ms ease-in-out;   -moz-transition: transform 250ms ease-in-out;   -ms-transition: transform 250ms ease-in-out;   -o-transition: transform 250ms ease-in-out;   transition: transform 250ms ease-in-out; } .footerlist_1 .footerlist-link:not([disabled]):hover {   color: black; } .footerlist_1 .footerlist-link:not([disabled]):hover::before {   transform: scaleX(1); }

scss: .login-btn{   @include setBgColor(#6358DC,$white);   padding: size(8.5) size(40);   @include radius(6);   @include transitionsall;   @include w100;   @include breakpoint(tab992){     padding: size(13.5) size(80);   }   @include hover{     @include setBgColor(darken(#6358DC,25%),$white);    } }

.form-input{   @include border(solid,1.5,rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1));   padding: size(8.8) size(16);   @include radius(8);   @include transitionsall;   &:focus{       @include border(solid,1.5,rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3));   }  }

.social-btn{ filter: drop-shadow(0px 4px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25)); background-color: #fff; @include flex-center; @include w100; gap:size(10); padding: size(10); @include radius(8); @include transitionsall; @include font($primaryFont,14,normal,normal,20); @include hover{ transform: translateY(-2px); } .social-img{ } }
